direction.description: Drag direction, optionally x, y, xy
direction.description_zh: 拖拽方向，可选值 x, y, xy

attraction.description: Snapping direction, optionally x, y, xy
attraction.description_zh: 吸附方向，可选值 x, y, xy

boundary.type: { top?: number | string, bottom?: number | string, left?: number | string, right?: number | string }

z-index.description: Drag and drop the hierarchy of elements

teleport.description: The location of the dragged element mount

methods.name: resize
methods.description: This method can be called to redraw when a position size change occurs
methods.description_zh: 产生位置大小变化时可以调用此方法进行重绘

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Reset the location information at the time of initialization
methods.description_zh: 重置初始化时的位置信息
